title: Institutional change from illiberal to lib. dem.

content.question: Describe one similarity and one difference between illiberal democracy and liberal democracy. Identify an institution that would need to be changed to make an illiberal democracy more liberal.Describe a change to the institution you identified in (b) that would facilitate a shift from illiberal to liberal democracy. Explain why the change you described in part (c) would lead to a more liberal democracy.

frqParts.text: Describe one similarity and one difference between illiberal democracy and liberal democracy. Identify an institution that would need to be changed to make an illiberal democracy more liberal.Describe a change to the institution you identified in (b) that would facilitate a shift from illiberal to liberal democracy. Explain why the change you described in part (c) would lead to a more liberal democracy.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
